shared.tester

Class ConfusionMatrixTestMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.tester.TestMetric
      • shared.tester.ConfusionMatrixTestMetric

  • public class ConfusionMatrixTestMetric
extends TestMetric
    A test metric to generate a confusion matrix. This metric expects the true labels to be supplied at construction time, both to make sure the results are binned correctly and to ensure clean output.
    Author:
    Jesse Rosalia

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfusionMatrixTestMetric(boolean[] labels)
      Construct the test metric with boolean labels.
      ConfusionMatrixTestMetric(DataSetDescription labelDesc)
      Construct the test metric with discrete values, contained in the label desc.
      ConfusionMatrixTestMetric(double[] labels)
      Construct the test metric with double valued labels.
      ConfusionMatrixTestMetric(int[] labels)
      Construct the test metric with discrete (integer) labels.

        Description copied from class: TestMetric
        Add a test result to the metric. The metric will compare the values and accumulate what data it needs.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        actual - The value produced by the classifier.
